result.eng: The ball is high in the air.
result.ga: Tá an liathróid ard san aer

result.ponchtml: Tá an liaṫróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.

result.eng: He was driving at a high speed.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ard

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ardHe was driving at a high speed.

result.eng: He managed to reach a high level.

result.orig: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amach

result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ leis leiḃéal ard a ḃaint amaċHe managed to reach a high level.

result.html: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.

result.eng: She let out a loud scream of laughter.
